useCase.name: Searching Content in API
useCase.description: User Agent initiates a search request to the Search Content API to retrieve content based on a specified search string.
useCase.trigger: User Agent sends a search request to the Search Content API.

mainSequence.step: User Agent sends a search request to the Search Content API containing the search string.
Search Content API receives the request and activates.
Search Content API runs a search query on the Content Database.
Content Database executes the search query and returns the results to the API.
Search Content API processes the query result and deactivates.
Search Content API sends the search results back to the User Agent with an HTTP 200 OK response.
